OOC: is the Starjumper above water?

::Lynxiz:: 
"I'm not sure, I've never been here before... Let me try a commlink," 
Lynxiz opens a comm-link to the Starjumper. "Uhhh, to the base in 
the water down there, this is Lynxiz, I am looking for my allies, I 
think I'm at the right place but... I had to take the risk of contacting 
you." Lynxiz looks hopefully at the below base.
